ovdesc.p: A table that holds the SEPA details for each entry from the External SEPA module
It can be manually input or updated through a local interface

desc.p: Id can be in any format
It can be value(s) from any T24 table so that it can be fetched using a local API
Single Value Field
This field holds the date when the entry was raised
Single Value Field
This is the message identification of the Batch
Single Value Field
This field holds Payment Information id
Single Value Field
This field identifies the Number of Transactions
Single Value Field
This field contains the Total Amount
Decimal values are also allowed
Credit Debit Indicator
Single Value Field
This field identifies whether the amount is in credit or debit
Associated Multi-value field
This field can be multivalued when there are multiple batch entries
Associated Multi-value field
This field holds the Account Service Reference
Associated Multi-value field
This field holds the Payment Information Id for transaction details
Associated Multi-value field
This field contains the Instruction id
Associated Multi-value field
This field identifies the end to end id of the transaction
Associated Multi-value field
This field identifies the id of the transaction
Associated Multi-value field
This field is the mandate ID
Associated Multi-value field
This field gives the cheque number
Associated Multi-value field
This field gives the transaction amount
Associated Multi-value field
The data provided must be in the following format Code*FamilyCode*Subfamily Code
Associated Multi-value field
The field contains the Proprietory code of the transaction
Associated Multi-value field
The field contains the issuer of Proprietor
Associated Multi-value field
The field contains the name of the debitor
Associated Multi-value field
The field contains the country address of the debitor
Valid Id from the country Table
Multi-value set, and maximum of 7 multi-value
The field contains the address of the debitor
To Identify the Bank Identification Code (BIC) for financial institution or BEI(Business Entity Identification) for non-Financial institution.
Associated Multi-value field
The other Id if any available of the debitor
Associated Multi-value field
The field contains the code of the scheme name
